sentence.text: WES also unraveled pathogenic mutations in genes not commonly linked to FTD, including mutations in Alzheimer (membrane protein ectodomain proteolysis, membrane protein ectodomain proteolysis), lysosomal (proteolysis, 7-exon macro-deletion) and cholesterol homeostasis pathways (CYP27A1).ConclusionOur unbiased approach reveals a wide genetic spectrum underlying clinical FTD, including 11% of seemingly sporadic FTD.
